headline: A Look At L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Valuation After Its Major Business Reorganization
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) is back in focus after reorganizing its business from four to three segments and reshuffling senior leadership. The move is aimed at aligning its operations with evolving U.S. defense priorities. See our latest analysis for L3Harris Technologies. The business reshuffle and recent decision to sell a majority stake in parts of its space propulsion and power systems business come as the share price trades at US$335.77, with a 30 day share price return of 17.43% and a...
